input.sentences: [male] decided to help his friends clean up their backyard .
they started with the old trees .
they were cut down and examined for plagues .
it took a team effort to get rid of all the dead trees .
it gave space for new young saplings .
output.sentences: Some male friends decided they should check some trees in the woods.
They looked at some trees that had started to grow along with some older ones.
When they examined the trees they found some that had a plague and needed to be cut down.
The team removed the trees to rid the area of any diseased trees.
The trees that were removed gave space for the men to plant new saplings.
